ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She walked very qickly to Megatron, hoping he didn t see that stunt she pulled.  Her face plates still red.  She looked down at the ground. Uh, Megatron.

::DarkMouse::

She walked very qickly to Megatron, hoping he didn't see that stunt she 
pulled.  Her face plates still red.  She looked down at the ground.
"Uh, Megatron.  I think I would have to request a new partner for this 
assignment you gave me.  I don't think Quickstrike is happy with me as a 
partner.  If you wish, I may go solo."


-----------Original Message-------------
>From: JP3884@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Wed, 21 Jun 2000 14:03:45 EDT

>::: Megatron smiles at Scorpinox. ::: Ah, excellent device! But, I dont 
>think
>we'll be needing it, she seems to be obedient.
>
>::: He turns to see Quickstrike and Darkmouse talking. Quickstrike didnt 
>seem
>thrilled. :::
>
>~~~~~~~`
>
>::: Marine slowly crawled in his beast mode to talk to Gremlin. He had
>expected an attack by now, even by Megatron, but nothing had happened. :::
>
>::: Marine ::: Marine, Terrorize!
>
>::: He transformed and stood a large seven feet over Gremlin, who stood a
>medium six. :::
>
>::: Marine ::: Now, what do you have to report?
>
>::: Gremlin ::: The shileds are still up and un touched, we have all out
>riffles and pistols charged and ready, and the cannon is still functonal.
>
>::: Marine looked at the cannon. It was a large device where the gunner 
>would
>sit in a small pod and fire the meter long cannon from safety. It was 
>similar
>to an Auto-gun, only used manually. :::
>
>::: Marine ::: Good. Hows radar?
>
>::: Gremlin ::: All is clear.
>
>::: Marine nodded and walked up to Pheniox and Transanulas. They had
>completed the mid section of the tower. The spider was on a scoffold 
>welding
>something, while the firebird was beneath him connecting wires. They seemed
>to be getting along at the moment. Marine then went back to a small
>transportable computer. He sat at it and contacted Hell Beast. :::
>
>::: Marine ::: Commander Hell Beast, phase two is in ful swing. The tower
>will be completed on schedual.
>
>::: Hell Beast's face formed from a swirl of static ::: Excellent General. 
>I
>knew I could count on you. But be wiry, I do antcipate an attack.
>
>::: Marine nodded ::: I concour. Its only a matter of time.
>
>::: Hell Beast nodded and the static filled the screen. Marine turned off 
>the
>counsol and looked towrds the entrace. He saw a Proto-human sniffing the 
>air
>around the shield, and Gremlin was antagonizing him. :::
>
>::: Gremlin ::: AH, a protohuman! Where is the rest of your disgusting 
>little
>tribe?
>
>::: Marine came over and stopped the fight. ::: Enough, Gremlin go and run 
>a
>diagnostic on the cannon, Ill deal with this...thing.
>
>::: Gremlin left the two alone. The human snarled at Marine, and Marine
>dismissed it. He watched as it ran away, and out of the cave. :::
>
>~~~~~~~~~~`
>
>::: Set, Ominous, and Ra waited in the bridge. They needed a new plan of
>attack....and for some reason there radio signals were getting 
>weaker.....:::
